attributes.action: Under 18's to be on the same wage as over 18's
attributes.additional_details: I am a strong believer in equal rights between people of all ages, genders and races. What I do not agree with is the fact that some employees offer and advertise a job with a set wage for different ages. If everybody is doing the same job then why should somebody be on a higher wage due to their age? This to me has all ways been a strong subject and I believe the government should create a law which makes all employees responsible for advertising a job as a set hourly wage and not a different wage for different ages!
